languages.text: "Помните, труд есть ваше служение. Лень и небрежение работой — грех в глазах Императора".
"Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Помните, труд есть ваше служение. Лень и небрежение работой — грех в глазах Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are sins in the eyes of the Emperor."
"Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are sins in the eyes of the Emperor."
"Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are sins in the eyes of the Emperor."
"Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

languages.text: “记住，辛苦劳作便是你的虔诚奉献。在帝皇眼中，懒惰与松懈都是不虔之举。”
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “记住，辛苦劳作便是你的虔诚奉献。在帝皇眼中，懒惰与松懈都是罪过。”

languages.text: «Recuerde: el trabajo es devoción. La inactividad y la laxitud son transgresiones ante el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerde: el trabajo es devoción. La inactividad y la laxitud son pecados ante el Emperador».

languages.text: 「忘れるな、労働は献身である。怠惰と弛緩は皇帝の目には罪と映る」
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「忘れるな、労働は献身である。怠惰と弛緩は皇帝の目には罪と映る」

languages.text: "Denkt daran: Arbeit ist Eure Andacht. Untätigkeit und Faulheit sind in den Augen des Imperators Vergehen."
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt daran: Arbeit ist Eure Andacht. Untätigkeit und Faulheit sind in den Augen des Imperators Sünden."

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas : le labeur est la preuve de votre dévotion. Oisiveté et laxisme sont des transgressions aux yeux de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas : le labeur est la preuve de votre dévotion. Oisiveté et laxisme sont un crime aux yeux de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Unutmayın: İşleyen demir ışıldar. Boş durmak ve tembellik etmek, İmparator'un gözünde günahtır."
languages.original_text: "Remember: toil is your devotion. Idleness and laxity are transgressions in the eyes of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Unutmayın: İşleyen demir ışıldar. Boş durmak ve tembellik etmek, İmparator'un gözünde günahtır."
